--- alter_change_stream_set_for_table_columns.sql
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name SET FOR table_name1(column1, column2), table_name2(column1, column2)

--- AST
&ast.AlterChangeStream{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 20,
    NameEnd: 38,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch: &ast.ChangeStreamWatch{
    WatchTables: []*ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
      &ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 47,
          NameEnd: 58,
          Name:    "table_name1",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 59,
            NameEnd: 66,
            Name:    "column1",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 68,
            NameEnd: 75,
            Name:    "column2",
          },
        },
        Rparen: 76,
      },
      &ast.ChangeStreamWatchTable{
        TableName: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 78,
          NameEnd: 89,
          Name:    "table_name2",
        },
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 90,
            NameEnd: 97,
            Name:    "column1",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 99,
            NameEnd: 106,
            Name:    "column2",
          },
        },
        Rparen: 108,
      },
    },
    SetForAllPos: 0,
  },
  DropAll:    false,
  DropAllPos: 0,
  Options:    (*ast.ChangeStreamOptions)(nil),
}

--- SQL
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name SET FOR table_name1(column1, column2), table_name2(column1, column2)
